amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 613, to prohibit funds to pay for abortions under the Federal employees health benefit program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 245 (Roll no. 364).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Grayson.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 245 (Roll no. 364).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
